entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
